text:
Hello everybody, i'm creating a custom template from HubSpot Hubl area. Basically i wanted to display many informations from HubSpot contact page ( variables ). example : name, email etc ...

All those info after connecting user to a restricted area.

What i need now is to display many variables/properties from *Pennylane* ( API ). If anybody have experience on that to know what i can display, and how difficult is it to do it.

Thank you

Hello ,
How can i get all deals details which are related to one contacat through API
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/10354251712/associations/deals>
for example this Link return just the IDs without any details . is there any way to get all deals details
Thank you
in associations can i get all details about contact and deals within one request

Hello, <@U2LEJ045D>, I know its been a while, but probably you managed to solve that issue? I am having it now also with HubSpot pagination code I used from documentation, do you probably remember anything about that?

Hi! I’m looking for advice on whether there’s a way to sync our website’s knowledge base with HubSpot’s knowledge base, either via API or other methods. Any help or suggestions would be greatly appreciated!

Thank you! :hugging_face:
Hi! I would like to know how do I hide/delete the published date from all of the blogs that I posted?

Hello there! Just browsing threads in this slack and wanted to let you know that we just launched a beta for a new Meetings API that I believe would fit this use case of booking meetings through the Meetings Scheduler tool that would be reflected in an integrated calendar! The documentation can be found <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/library/meetings|here>
If you manually add a field to a module, HubSpot will update the fields.json of the module.

Is anyone else having issues logging into HubSpot?
I have been getting this all day
Does anyone know of a method to clone / transfer dashboards from one portal to another?

Hey there! I created a private app to integrate Avaya with HubSpot for a client in the higher education industry. The providers require a link to provide data that HubSpot will read within the API calls. Has anyone had any previous experience that can recommend some tips for following these steps?
